quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

quotes.author: Carl Sagan
quotes.quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

quotes.author: Isaac Newton
quotes.quote: If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants.

quotes.author: Marie Curie
quotes.quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood.

quotes.author: Galileo Galilei
quotes.quote: You cannot teach a man anything; you can only help him find it within himself.

quotes.author: Stephen Hawking
quotes.quote: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.

quotes.author: Richard Feynman
quotes.quote: I would rather have questions that can't be answered than answers that can't be questioned.

quotes.author: Charles Darwin
quotes.quote: It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.

quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
quotes.quote: The good thing about science is that it's true whether or not you believe in it.

quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci
quotes.quote: Nature is full of infinite causes that have never occurred in experience.

quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
quotes.quote: Faith is not something to grasp, it is a state to grow into.

quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quotes.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.quote: Faith is the strength by which a shattered world shall emerge into the light.

quotes.author: C.S. Lewis
quotes.quote: Faith is the art of holding on to things your reason has once accepted, in spite of your changing moods.

quotes.author: Pope John Paul II
quotes.quote: Faith and reason are like two wings on which the human spirit rises to the contemplation of truth.

quotes.author: Mother Teresa
quotes.quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.

quotes.author: Rumi
quotes.quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. It will not lead you astray.

quotes.author: Blaise Pascal
quotes.quote: Faith is different from proof; the latter is human, the former is a Gift from God.

quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer
quotes.quote: Faith is only real when there is obedience, never without it, and faith only becomes faith in the act of obedience.

quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore
quotes.quote: Faith is the bird that feels the light when the dawn is still dark.

quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
quotes.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.

quotes.author: Mark Twain
quotes.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive.

quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci
quotes.quote: As a well-spent day brings happy sleep, so a life well spent brings happy death.

quotes.author: Albert Camus
quotes.quote: In the midst of winter, I found there was, within me, an invincible summer.

quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau
quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.

quotes.author: Khalil Gibran
quotes.quote: You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
